typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	adf_name as string ('')
}
source(output(
		Airport_Name as string,
		Altitude as short,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		DST as string,
		IATA as string,
		ICAO as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Time_Zone as string,
		UTC_offset as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ArptBlob
ArptBlob derive(ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id,
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddADFColumns
AddADFColumns sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StgAirports
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_JOB_NAME as string,
		ADF_SUC_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ADF_SUC_TS = ADF_TIME_STMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
